entities.description: Strong urge to drink alcohol in the past 12 months.
Needed a lot more alcohol to get the feeling you want.
The same amount of alcohol having much less effect in the past 12 months.
Trying to cut down or stop drinking alcohol in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent having a strong urge to drink alcohol in the past 12 months.
Indicates the respondent needing more alcohol to get the feeling they want.
Indicates the respondent feeling that the same amount of alcohol has less effect than it used to.
Indicates the respondent trying to cut down or stop drinking alcohol in the past 12 months.
